our_goal.title: OUR GOAL
our_goal.description: Our goal is to become the leading project in the crypto sphere on the TON blockchain, enabling people to earn real TON coin income while enjoying an engaging game experience. Unlock new opportunities with us!

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Cryptoflats is a T2M (tap to mine) project on the TON blockchain, allowing users to generate profit in TON coins through virtual game rooms and the project’s native token $CFLAT. To simplify income accumulation, we have developed an intuitive and easy-to-use game application. Get your first earnings for free!

rarity_properties.title: RARITY PROPERTIES
rarity_properties.description: Our collection features digital game rooms with varying rarity levels, providing their owners with exclusive advantages. GEN#1 through GEN#5 will consist of a series of in-game assets, decreasing in quantity from 5,555 to 1,111.

concept.title: CONCEPT
concept.description: The core inspiration behind Cryptoflats is the vision of a virtual ecosystem and a metaverse, where every player owns interactive game rooms with financial mechanics.
concept.content: We have found the perfect balance between the design of income-generating rooms and a sustainable financial model for our players. The earning process is structured as an engaging game experience, integrating CFLATS gameplay, digital game rooms, and the $CFLAT token.

team.title: TEAM
team.description: Cryptoflats was founded by two visionary designers with a strong passion for blockchain and digital assets. Their innovative approach, unrestricted by technical limitations, led to the creation of a stylish and immersive room collection, blending surreal aesthetics with functional game mechanics.

description.0: The first phase of Cryptoflats' entertainment ecosystem is CFLATS GAME – a tap-to-mine Telegram-based application that enables players to accumulate TON coins through interactive gameplay, utilizing our core mechanics: $CFL coins, virtual rooms, and the $CFLAT token.
description.1: Build your own virtual game rooms and earn them for free upon reaching 1,000,000 in-game $CFL coins. The number of available spots is limited, so secure the most profitable rooms today!

contact_us.title: CONTACT US
contact_us.description: We always stay in touch and open to suggestions
